Free Tools

Free SEO Tools to Analyze Your Website

Audit your site's performance, identify technical issues, and discover growth opportunities -- all for free. No signup required.

SEO Site Audit

Run a comprehensive audit of your website covering technical SEO, on-page optimization, and content quality. Get actionable recommendations.

Free

Page Speed Analyzer

Check your page load times, Core Web Vitals scores, and get specific recommendations for improving site performance.

Free

Schema Markup Validator

Validate your structured data implementation and check if your pages are eligible for rich results in Google search.

Free

Meta Tag Checker

Analyze your title tags, meta descriptions, and heading structure. Get suggestions for improving click-through rates.

Free

AI Visibility Checker

See how your brand appears in AI-generated answers across ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews.

Free

Robots.txt Tester

Check if search engine bots can properly crawl your website. Identify blocked resources and configuration issues.

Free

Frequently Asked Questions

Yes, all the tools listed on this page are 100% free to use with no hidden charges. We offer them as a resource to help businesses get started with SEO analysis and identify key opportunities for improvement.

Our tools are built on the same technology stack we use for our client work, so the results are highly accurate. However, free tools provide a surface-level analysis. For a comprehensive, actionable audit, we recommend booking a free strategy call with our team.

No, you do not need to create an account or sign up for anything. Simply enter your website URL and get instant results. No email required, no strings attached.

We continuously update our tools to reflect the latest search engine algorithms and best practices. Our engineering team rolls out improvements on a regular basis to ensure you're always getting the most current analysis possible.

Absolutely. You're welcome to use our free tools to audit any publicly accessible website, including client sites. Many agencies and freelancers use our tools as part of their prospecting and audit workflows.

Our free tools give you a starting point. For a comprehensive SEO audit with a custom action plan, book a free strategy call.
